text: -- the golem doesn't seem to care --
-- the golem slowly turn it's head toward you --
-- the golem starts inhaling deeply --

From the fire you woke again!
Do you remember anything?

Of course not...
You're just a spirit.
Volatile.

Anyway, let me get this straight. 
The fiery bird is almost here and the temple is a mess!
We haven't received neither the myrrhe nor the silk, the main altar is broken and that stupid old golem isn't helping either.

I need to summon another one but it seems that I've forgotten a scroll somewhere.
The librarian can't find it either. It must be in the basement.

You found not basement!
Don't be shy, go downstair and figure out where that scroll is.

Oh, and the basement is dark,
so you'll have to light it up.

Since you're a spirit, turning into a source of fire shouldn't be too hard.
If you stay near a flame, you shall turn into one.

Oh my! A spirit!
And quite a pretty one!

It seems like you just arrived here, right?
Don't worry, it feels wierd at first, but you'll get used to it.

Let me introduce myself:
I'm the merchant!

Quite a fitting name, I know.
I like to collect the things that human makes.

Coins, jewelry, hats!
I'll take everything!
Perhaps you could help me?
There's still a bunch of coins to find.
The more I collect, the more I'm human!
I freed myself from my glass house a long time ago.

The crazed woman who made got sick from the fumes
And I pushed myself off the table.
Reckless, I know.
